data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Fenglong, Aston, Paul, Fikáček, Martin (2014): Review of the Chinese species of the genus Coelostoma Brullé, 1835 (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae: Sphaeridiinae). Zootaxa 3887 (3): 354-376, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3887.3.4
